name: Inside (itch) (not-tomo)
description:
Description

Play as Eleanor, a girl who finds herself noticing strange occurrences happening in her local park. She is accompanied by her friend Layne, and their sidekick, Luda the cat!

Prepare for a short adventure. The game will autosave after critical points.

Controls

  • Movement with the Arrow Keys or WASD.
  • Confirm with Enter
  • F4 - Full Screen
  • F5 - Restart Game

Credits

  • Artwork: Shayla, https://twitter.com/SashimiSplash
  • Music: @not-tomo
  • Font: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen, https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
